title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Cook the bacon in a pan until crispy.
Whisk the eggs and Parmesan together in a bowl.
Combine the spaghetti, bacon, and egg mixture quickly.
Serve with a sprinkle of black pepper.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: A quick and healthy breakfast with smashed avocado, lemon juice, and a sprinkle of salt.
ingredients: Optional toppings: chili flakes, cherry tomatoes
instructions: Toast the bread slices to your liking.
Mash the avocado with lemon juice and a pinch of salt.
Spread the avocado mixture on the toasted bread.
Add optional toppings like chili flakes or cherry tomatoes.
